attributes.action: prevent the present speaker of the house, Michael Martin, from receiving a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should set an example by blocking such titles and benefits ever being bestowed on members of the house that have knowingly attempted to prevent the publication of corrupt practices being released into the public domain

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
